subject: Order#SSN5980
description_text:
Hello, 
I would like to check on the status of the order.  
Looks like only the Haptic parts shipped out but not the pedal. 
I understand it might be out of stock and has to made to order. 
Please let me know the estimate time frame when I should expect them and I’m willing to pay extra to expedite it.  
Thank you,
Anh Vo
